short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NEO thin wallet for chrome extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NeoLine is a thin wallet chrome extension, it provides dapis for developers who want to interact easily with NEO blockchain.
And now supports Neo X!
allowing you add any EVM network and bridge assets between Neo N3 and Neo X within the wallet.
long.zh_CN: NeoLine is a thin wallet chrome extension, it provides dapis for developers who want to interact easily with NEO blockchain.
